item.description:
Leslie S. will be your host for this event.

Not your average Thursday night…spend this one viewing the amazing vistas this park has to offer. Only 2 miles off Route 93 via either Columbia Rd. or down Summer Street from South Station, you will have 2 choices- a 2 mile walk along the waterfront taking in views of the Boston Harbor islands, city skyscrapers, and Bunker Hill on a paved and boardwalk path, all with flat terrain OR a climb up one level to the open air observatory of Fort Independence where you can see forever while watching the sunset over the Harbor.

We will reconnect at the end and for those who would like, we will mosey down the street into Southie for a drink or two.

We will convene in front of Sullivan's Take-Out at the entrance to the park and reconnect back at the same point. At the conclusion, those who would like can mosey down the street into Southie for a drink or two.

This location offers plenty of free parking and great summer take-out fare if you would like.

Please call Leslie at 617 848-8802 when you arrive (or if late) so we don’t leave anyone behind.

This event will be rescheduled if it rains.
item.name: Sunset Tour of Castle Island and Fort Independence Observatory
